Uses of Package
io.helidon.messaging

  • Packages that use io.helidon.messaging 
    Package Description
    io.helidon.messaging
    Helidon Reactive Messaging.
    io.helidon.messaging.connectors.kafka
    Microprofile messaging Kafka connector.
  • Classes in io.helidon.messaging used by io.helidon.messaging 
    Class Description
    Channel
    Channel representing publisher - subscriber relationship.
    Channel.Builder
    Channel builder.
    ConnectorConfigBuilder
    Detached configuration of a single connector.
    Emitter
    Emitter is convenience publisher for one or multiple channels, publishing is as easy as calling Emitter.send(Object) method.
    Emitter.Builder
    Builder for Emitter.
    Messaging
    Helidon Reactive Messaging.
    Messaging.Builder  
  • Classes in io.helidon.messaging used by io.helidon.messaging.connectors.kafka 
    Class Description
    ConnectorConfigBuilder
    Detached configuration of a single connector.
    Stoppable
    Messaging connector which can be notified about messaging stop.
